column4: How do I find out what video driver im using, and how do I configure it in 8.10? xorg.conf is practically blank...
there's an Xorg log in /var/log/. It'll say somewhere in there. xorg.conf is practically blank because xorg autodetects most of its settings now.
change the driver? Add the required command to xorg.conf. Settings that are put in there override the autodetection.
you'd put a ``Driver "drivername"`` line in the Device section, specifically
